input.description: Path to comma-separated file containing information about the samples in the experiment.

scorefile.description: Path to a scoring file in PGS Catalog format. Multiple scorefiles can be specified using wildcards (e.g., --scorefile "path/to/scores/*.txt")

target_build.description: Genome build of target genomes(*GRCh38*, GRCh37).

hg38_chain.description: Small hg38 reference data is needed to run the calculator. https://hgdownload.soe.ucsc.edu/goldenPath/hg38/liftOver/hg38ToHg19.over.chain.gz

hg19_chain.description: Small hg19 reference data is needed to run the calculator. https://hgdownload.cse.ucsc.edu/goldenpath/hg19/liftOver/hg19ToHg38.over.chain.gz

run_ancestry.description: Path to a directory that can store relabelled genotypes (and the reference panel intersections and PCA with â€“run_ancestry) to speed up new PGS calculations on previously harmonized samples

min_overlap.description: Minimum proportion of variants present in both the score file and input target genomic data

pheno.description: Path to sample information file: plink 1 fam files, plink 2 fam files, or the VCF path

variants.description: Path to variant information file: plink 1 bim, plink 2 pvar, or the VCF path

geno.description: Path to genoftype file: plink 1 bed, plink 2 pgen, or the VCF path
